profile.name: Kenneth Jakobsen
profile.title: Senior WebDev
profile.text: 32 Years old, based in Odense, Denmark, My personality is [ISTP](https://www.16personalities.com/istp-personality) ([personal traits](https://www.16personalities.com/profiles/57bb13f7f3a90)), im an non-smoker. I started programming in 2003 (VB6) as a part of a school project and got hooked instantly. I care about web performance and a good user experience, i enjoy hunting for less ms in load performance and a fan of technologies based on non-blocking io. When im not writing code i enjoy playing hardball (paintball without paint), music and concerts. And just enjoying life with friends and cold beers.

cv.title: Web developer
description: Primarily worked with our internal tools and ensured everything was running as it was supposed to, as well as adding new features when requested from my co-workers.

Other tasks consist of
• Building custom tools for clients
• Counselling clients in how to optimise their websites
• Updating clients websites

cv.title: Web developer (volunteer)
description: As I like to share my knowledge with others, I do really like the TED concept, so im happy to give a hand and help organise the event in Odense by ensuring that the website is running smooth and it is up-to-date.

cv.title: Student at Erhvervsakademiet Lillebælt
description: In order to have the papers needed to teach web-development i decided to take this bachelor, so i can teach some day in the future when im old and burned out writing code.

Here are a few prototypes i made during the education
• Tinderbox festival app (native app)
• Parking app (web app)
• Attribution tracking platform

cv.title: DevOps
description: The task was to create a new e-commerce system from scratch, I was working on server configuration, website performance and optimisation.

Before
• Magento with Varnish Cache enabled.
• Average init load time was 1.287ms
• Total load time: 4.130ms based on pingdom
• Yearly cost of 406.000DKK

After
• Average init load time; 560ms without cache
• Average init load time; 88ms with cache
• Total load time: 992ms based on pingdom
• Yearly cost of 64.000DKK

cv.title: Web developer
description: Working on a record label management tool for BMG; to manage releases, dj promos ect. I also made websites for events and artists connected to BMG.

cv.title: Teacher
description: Teaching in web development and helping students with debugging of their code when they got stuck.
